column5: Hey all, some of you asked me to let you know when my nephew Dan will be on TV again.  It's tonight on ER Here's the e-mail I recieved from my sister.  "Hi everyone ~ Don't forget to watch ER this Thursday!  Daniel plays the role of Finn Andrews, a 16 year old champion wrestler that comes into the ER for what is thought to be a stomach virus....it isn't!"   Hope you can watch!!  Heck, I hope I can watch it  Thursday Oct 11 on NBC at 10:00 pm.  Maureen
Very cool Maureen!  I've been watching ER since it began....I'll make sure to look out for him tonight.
WHEW!!!!!!!!!  I thought it said "IN E.R. tonight". You must be proud.
Wow.. gonna try to catch that tonight.. if not, maybe record it...  I like E.R. too...
Well I watched it.  He was pretty good  Joey
Thanks folks, he's a good kid and I couldn't be happier for him.  He sure has improved since the last time I saw him  Maureen
I watched the show last night.  He was very good!!  Thanks for the heads up.
Our grandson...the movie star !  Like Maureen said...his acting has improved...  Maribeth and I are right proud of him...
Sorry, I missed it.     I know how you feel.  I'm waiting for my nephews made for tv movie this month.  Pam
